of your

There are soooo many thought provoking ideas in this book. I've been
reading small bits at a time to let it all sink in. But as soon I
finish reading the book, I will get my thoughts together and send you
my impressions. Thanks.

Jean

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] John Holt's book
messages.msgSnippet: Yeah. I just read it myself, and it s my favorite though I skimmed through much of the school stuff in the middle. It just crystalizes everything beautifully.
messages.messageBody:
Yeah. I just read it myself, and it's my favorite though I skimmed
through much of the school stuff in the middle. It just crystalizes
everything beautifully. I'm trying to get dh to read at least a chapter
or two. While on our vacation and he was a captive audience, I did read
several passages to him and we had some really great discussions.

--Danielle

http://www.danielleconger.com/Homeschool/Welcomehome.html



ckmgym wrote:

>I've just started reading John Holt's "Instead of Education." All I
>can say is, WOW.
>
>Jean
